name: WickerWood - An Autumn delight!
description:
CANDLES, FIRE, FIREFLIES!!COLLECT, BREATHE FIRE!

The Wickerman is preparing for the fall activities. He must find and collect candles to ignite the bonfire.

A very simple game of object collection.

WickerWood © 2016. All Rights Reserved. Game created by Exploitation Games

KEY FEATURES
  • FREE
  • Item collection
  • Breathes fire
  • WIN by collecting all the candles
  • Dark, peaceful forest
  • Lightning bugs floating in the air
  • Crickets chirping in the background
  • 3D Animation

CONTENT SUITABLE FOR EVERYONE: features a character that breathes fire.

Wickerman animation that led to making the video game.

Wickerman Animation

GAME #1

This is our 1st game. We started simple with item collection only. Everything in the game is made by us, using LightWave3D. Game made with Unity3D.
